Headline: Brown Line Trains Resume Stopping at Sedgwick Station
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains have resumed making stops at Sedgwick Station.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Brown Line trains have resumed making stops at Sedgwick Station.

Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier mechanical problem at 95th. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier mechanical problem at 95th.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service in the affected area.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
